text: Upon functional activation of granulocytes by 4 beta-phorbol 12-myristate 13-acetate ( PMA ) , the levels of <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> jun B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> jun D <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts were increased .

text: The three jun genes showed a similar time course in their induction by PMA , maximal mRNA levels being reached after 60 min of induction .

These results suggest that expression of <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> jun B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> jun D <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> genes might be involved in terminal granulocyte differentiation or in regulating granulocyte functionality .
